txt.en: The leader of the Tailors's Guild has asked you to show the apprentices how to make clothing that will protect even the most reckless of Lore-masters.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nSew a guild-pattern undershirt.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern undershirt
'Cloth wearers need as much protection as they can get without becoming weighed down by armour. This isn't the easiest balance to strike for new tailors. Show them how to finesse such harmony.'
Talk to the Tailor's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern undershirt
'Cloth wearers need as much protection as they can get without becoming weighed down by armour. This isn't the easiest balance to strike for new tailors. Show them how to finesse such harmony.'
Turn in a guild-pattern undershirt ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Hambrennil
Talk to the Tailor's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern undershirt ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Tailor's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
